name: Yamaha R15 v4
description: R15 V4 is the 4th generation of legendry R15 which shares the same DNA with super sports YZF R1.R15 V4 comes with 155 CC LC4V SOHC FI ENGINE WITH VVA equipped with a Traction Control System and a Quick Shifter.

name: Honda CBR 150R
description: CBR150R comes in two variants: ABS and non-ABS. The updated bike features an all-new look, updated instrumentation, a golden USD Showa SFF-BP fork, and a slipper clutch. The engine has remained largely unchanged.

name: Kawasaki Ninja 125
description: Kawasaki Ninja 125 a single-cylinder, fuel-injected, DOHC, 4-valves, four-stroke, engine. The engine is liquid-cooled with 6-speed gearbox. It's maximum power @ 10,000 RPM and 11.7 Nm of peak torque @ 7,700 RPM.

name: Suzuki Gixxer SF150
description: Suzuki Gixxer SF comes with a 154.9 cc, 4-stroke, 1-cylinder air cooled engine, producing 14.6 BHP @ 8000 rpm and 14 NM @ 6000 rpm. This carburator engine has 5-speed manual gearbox. Fuel injection is coming soon.

name: Yamaha MT-15
description: Yamaha MT 15 generates a power of 18.5 PS @ 10000 rpm and a torque of 13.9 Nm @ 8500 rpm. The claimed mileage of MT 15 is 52.02 kmph. Yamaha MT 15 gets Disc brakes in the front and rear.

name: Hero Glamour 125
description: Hero Glamour is powered by 124.7 cc engine which generates a power of 10.84 PS @ 7500 rpm and a torque of 10.6 Nm @ 6000 rpm. The claimed mileage of Glamour is 69.49 kmpl. Hero Glamour gets Drum brakes in the front and rear.

name: Yamaha FZS v3
description: Yamaha FZS v2 is powered by 153cc carburetted engine putting out 13.8 bhp and 13.6 Nm of torque. The bike is also equipped tubeless tires, digital gauges and monoshock suspension. The mileage figure stands at 50 kmpl.

name: Hero Hunk 150R
description: Hero Hunk 150R ABS is powered by 149.2 cc engine which generates Maximum power 10.55 kw @ 8500±500 RPM and its maximum torque is 12.6 Nm @ 6500±500 RPM. and it burns fuel 50 KM per Liter (approx).

name: Honda CB 150R
description: Honda CB 150R uses 149cc DOHC 4-valve, fi, liquid-cooled engine with 6-speed gearbox. It is the same engine that also powers the Honda CBR150R which delivers 16.8bhp of power @ 9,000rpm and 13.7Nm of torque @ 7,000rpm.

name: Lifan KPT 150
description: Lifan KPT 150 is powered by 150 cc engine which generates Maximum power 14.8 Bhp @ 8500 rpm and its maximum torque is 14 Nm @ 6500 rpm. KPT can runs 120 KM per hour and it burns fuel 45 KM per Liter (approx).
